rules_text:
Deathtouch
{T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create a tapped Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
notes:
2.2.0: Moved to a 2-drop, but now the treasures come in tapped.
Original flavor text:
Zaruboggan eat materials most species consider toxic and will happily take this voltant as payment for cleaning work.
